113.content:
"You know, I've always wanted to try a brain transplant, but it's so hard to find volunteers." He comments off-handedly, stepping out of the room after locking the wheels on your table so you can't roll away. Still too weak from the sedatives to get free, all you can do is wait, the sound of your heart pounding in your ears in the quiet.

After an while, he returns with a second table. You can't see it, but you can hear the wheels squeak and the mechanism click as he parks it behind yours. The two of you now head to head.

"Don't worry my dears, think of it as trading places." he comments in a tone that's anything but reassuring. Your counterpart just gives out a muffled cry in response. "I'm sure I can put you back into each other's bodies afterwards." You can't tell for certain but the muffled voice sounded like your sister.

From between the two of you you can him hum some random tune as a scalpel enters your line of sight momentarily. Then you feel it cutting, delicately slicing a line around your scalp following the contours of your hairline. It stings, but not like a cut should, more like a dentist working on a tooth after freezing it. You only just feel it. Still you can't help but whimper, not from the feeling, but from knowing that you can't stop this madman in your current state, and if he kills you in the process he'll just work on some other member of your family next.

He's stopped working on you but now you can hear faint sounds from the other patient. And still that annoying humming.

"I am a genius." he softly comments to himself, stepping back and putting the scalpel away, only to return with a small saw which quickly whirs to life. slicing through the bone of both of your skulls in short order leaving only a few delicate membranes between the brains he plans to operate on, and the open air. You feel a slight pressure in your forehead, followed by a sudden slight pain behind your eyes as everything goes black. A moment later the same sensation again but in a different spot as the world is muted. Lastly a sharp pain in your neck and you can no-longer feel your body. I'm just a brain now... you manage to think before your mind shuts down from the shock of what's been done to it.

- - - - -

You can't tell how much time has passed since you blacked out, but you're lying on the couch at home. Getting up you look out the window to see the house next door looking abandoned with a sign out front saying "For sale: FREE!". At least that crackpot is gone. Letting out a sigh, you notice your voice doesn't sound right.

Heading to the washroom, you can plainly see that he left you in a body not your own before he ran off. And most likely, left someone else in yours. Looking in the mirror you see ________ staring back at you, the thin red line of a carefully cleaned and stitched cut tracing the edge of her, or should I say your, hairline.

"I was really hoping that was a bad dream..." The current occupant of your old body grumbles, having walked in while you were looking at your new reflection. "It's me, ________. In case you're wondering." 'he' states.

"Hey, kid. You awake?", asks the pleasant Mr. Ree.

"Wh-wha?", I replied.

"It's me, your next door neighbor", replied Mr. Ree, "I've decided to use you as my private guinea pigs for a series of experiments. I hope you don't mind too terribly."

It was only then that I came to the full realization that I was tied to a chair, seated inside what appeared to be a room with a single window, which just so happened to be high on the wall behind my head.

There sat Mr. Ree, the Korean store-owner and (it was whispered around town) suspected Communist terrorist! He looked smug and self-satisfied as he looked dead at me, unable to so much as lift a fist from the arms of the bindings holding me to the seat.

"What is it that you want with my family?!?", I pleaded.

"Oh, Kuddles", replied my squinty-eyed captor, "I trust you don't mind if I call you that?", laughed the sickly-looking Asian, "Think of yourself and your family as the progeny of a "Bland New Lace"? I have so many ideas! The economic windfall for human pet pasturing is endless! Your gorgeous-looking family will make superb specimens for my genetic experiments. As an example, allow me to reintroduce your twin sister Lucy, now modified by the one and only Mr. Ree!"

And with that, the fiendish genius summons Lucy, my very own twin sister into the room!

“Lucy! Come here girl.” grins the creepy Mr. Ree as he extends a hand towards an entranceway into the room where you and your family are currently held. Your parents and siblings are all fully reclined horizontally in their restraining chairs, while he has your chairs back raised for you to easily see the doorway and view him as he speaks to you without having to strain your neck.

Then, the evil Korean makes a little “tik-tik-tik-“-sound towards the dark outer hall, his voice in a high pitch as he says, Come, kitty Puffin, tik-tik-tik, there you are! Who’s a good kitten?”, while he motions to the door. Puffin is the name of your twin sister’s little kitten the family recently adopted.

So you are shocked beyond belief when your sister Lucy comes crawling into the room on all fours, completely naked, eyes wide, and sniffing around before her eyes light on yours. When she notices you and the rest of your family (your Mom and Dad have been craning their necks, begging you to tell them what it is you’re seeing), she arches her back and does a sidelong jump backwards, away from the side of the room where you are all restrained and crying out. Situating herself between the mad scientist and you and the rest of the family in the room, she appears suddenly disinterested in everything else around her as she gracefully reclines on her side. She makes a cute sort of plaintive mewling noise a couple of times to no one in particular before she begins a strange licking and grooming activity, starting with her face and hair, and moving lower to her neck and shoulders.

You cry out, “Lucy! Don’t you recognize me? I’m your twin brother! You’ve got to go for help! Run! Tell someone we’re trapped down here!”

You are shocked to see Lucy then continue further down her body, licking her hands while rubbing them all over her perky pink titties, causing them to glisten provocatively.

“Your sister Lucy doesn’t recognize you because that is no longer the bodily vessel for your sister’s mind. What you see before you is for all practical purposes your pet kitten Puffin” Mr. Ree informs you “While I have simultaneously transferred your sister’s brain into that of the fluffy kitten, Puffins!”

You look him dead in the eye and say, “You are completely insane. Deep down, you know that. Right?”

“Am I?”, laughs Ree, as Lucy crawls up beside him on her knees. He reaches down and scratches the back of her neck, and she raises up on her haunches, nestling his trousers for more attention before again dropping to her hands and knees directly in front of him.

“That’s it, Lucy! Trip him up! Go for help!” you yell again at your nude sister acting really strange on the floor not 10 feet from you, still hoping that she’s just faking being a cat or something for his amusement. Ree starts softly petting your twin sister’s back, while she starts a cute purring noise and hoists her rear as high as she can with her knees still on the floor, while looking up at Ree playfully.

There are Japanese business men who would pay enough for you or I to live on forever, for a pet kitten like ‘Puffins’, here.”, your insidious neighbor Mr. Ree tells you, “Or, if necessary, you and your family can stay in the restraints, while I concoct more strange experiments to prove my capabilities to you.” As he explains this to you, he produces a big ball of colorful twine in one hand, and a laser pointer in the other.
